Summary: Observed round dropping white green object in north sky
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were watching tv at 2120. our tv and two sets of double windows were directly in front of us. we both observed a round white green object quickly dropping straight downward(lasting only a few seconds). it was in the north sky. it is in a plane route. but this was straight in front of us and dropping down. it seemed close but we could not see if it landed anywhere. we both commented and thought it might be a meteor.i had been keeping a journal and wrote down the time and what we observed,because it was so unusual. i still have the notes. i read in the naples daily news today (04\27\2010) that objects were observed in our area during the same time frame and checking my notes saw it was in the same time frame.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were 2 other sightings in Naples on or around March 30th 2010
